column3: Added a commit that makes some validation globals static (and private).\n
I think "we" should get Matt's blockchain tester tool working with the pull-tester again before merging this.\n

Automatic sanity-testing: PASSED, see http://jenkins.bluematt.me/pull-tester/caca6aa4eb54b71b5e4e9ccfa69341f985b178d9 for binaries and test log.\nThis test script verifies pulls every time they are updated. It, however, dies sometimes and fails to test properly.  If you are waiting on a test, please check timestamps to verify that the test.log is moving at http://jenkins.bluematt.me/pull-tester/cu
ACK. (Now that it has a comparison tool pass!)\n
